subject: Re: Box alternatives.
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Yeah, the voices get made all kinds of ways, but combining speech 
fragments and noise seems common.

 Frank-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "LC Duplatt" <lcdupla@...> wrote:
>
> Frank S, I believe you are correct on this, as I am playing with my 
> own box prototype and noticed by speeding up the scan (beyond the 
RS 
> Hack speed) that it sounds more like your box or the MiniBox, in 
that 
> the words seem to be created via the audio bits, white noise and 
> music scanned - true manipulation into communication.  
> 
> But, when I slow the scan down to around the RS Hack scan speed, it 
> sounds more like messages are carried upon the noise and audio 
> bits...maybe just my imagination, but have you or anyone else 
noticed 
> this?
> 
> LC
> http://www.AngelsGhosts.com
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@> 
> wrote:
> >
> > 
> > I think it has to do with the raw audio concept, the spirits use 
> part of the speech to make a voice out of. 
> >  
> >  Frank-S
> > _________________________________________________________________

> > http://www.windowslive.com/share.html?
> ocid=TXT_TAGHM_Wave2_sharelife_012008
